# Description

This guided project serves the purpose of practicing data analysis. The data is available for download here: https://data.world/dataquest/book-reviews


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r message = FALSE}
## Import data
dat <- read_csv("book_reviews.csv")

## Size of dataset 
dim(dat)

## column names 
colnames(dat)

## Types of columns using a for loop 
coltype <- c()
for (t in colnames(dat)) {
  t <- typeof(dat[[t]])
  coltype <- c(coltype, t)
}
coltype

## Types of columns using a vector 
lapply(head(dat), class)
```
